prerequisites.name: JavaScript Fundamentals
prerequisites.description: Core JavaScript concepts including variables, functions, objects, and ES6+ syntax

prerequisites.name: React Basics
prerequisites.description: Understanding React components, JSX syntax, and component lifecycle

prerequisites.name: React Hooks
prerequisites.description: useState, useEffect, useContext, and other React hooks for managing component state

prerequisites.name: Component Props & Data Flow
prerequisites.description: Understanding how to pass data between components and unidirectional data flow

prerequisites.name: Context API
prerequisites.description: React's built-in solution for managing global state without prop drilling

prerequisites.name: Redux Fundamentals
prerequisites.description: Understanding actions, reducers, store, and dispatch in Redux pattern

prerequisites.name: Asynchronous Operations
prerequisites.description: Handling async data fetching with promises, async/await, and API calls

prerequisites.name: State Management in React
prerequisites.description: Comprehensive understanding of different state management patterns and when to use each approach

questions.question: What is the primary data type for storing key-value pairs in JavaScript?
Which of the following is NOT an ES6+ feature?
What does the spread operator (...) do in JavaScript?
What is JSX?
options: B) A syntax extension that looks like HTML/XML

questions.question: What is a React component?
options: B) A reusable piece of UI that returns JSX

questions.question: How do you pass data to a React component?
What does the useState hook return?
options: B) An array with state and setter function

questions.question: When does useEffect run by default?
What is the dependency array in useEffect used for?
options: B) To control when the effect runs

questions.question: What is prop drilling?
options: B) Passing props through many nested components

questions.question: Can child components modify props directly?
What is unidirectional data flow?
options: A) Data flows from child to parent
B) Data flows from parent to child

resources.title: React Context API - Complete Guide
resources.description: Comprehensive tutorial on using Context API for state management

resources.title: Context API Documentation
resources.description: Official React documentation on Context API

resources.title: Context API Interactive Examples
resources.description: Hands-on examples and exercises for Context API

resources.studyTips: Start with simple examples, then move to complex nested contexts. Practice avoiding unnecessary re-renders by using useMemo.

resources.title: Redux Course - Complete Beginner Guide
resources.description: Full course covering Redux from basics to advanced patterns

resources.title: Redux Official Documentation
resources.description: Complete Redux API reference and tutorials

resources.title: Redux Counter Project
resources.description: Build a counter app with Redux to understand actions and reducers

resources.studyTips: Build a simple counter first, then move to a todo app. Use Redux DevTools to debug state changes.
